channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Judge's Suicide Inspires 'White Flower' Judicial Reform Movement in Taiwan
item.description: Taiwan's legal community is demanding judicial reforms after a 38-year-old judge took his own life on April 12. The suicide has sparked conversations about workload pressure and ot

item.title: Taiwanese Stores Often Fail To Check ID for Tobacco Purchases: Health Officials
item.description: Health officials in Taiwan have found that over 30% of stores that sell tobacco products are not checking IDs in accordance with law. Merchants could be fined up to about US$7,700

item.title: Analysis: Taiwan-India Ties Set To Deepen Under Expected Third Modi Term
item.description: Ties between Taipei and New Delhi have improved markedly during the administrations of Tsai Ing-wen and Narendra Modi, says Madhav Das Nalapat, vice chair of Manipal Advanced Resea

item.title: Bluefin Tuna Season Opens in Taiwan
item.description: Bluefin tuna season has opened in the waters off southern Taiwan.
